casebody.data:
Second Department,

May, 1959

(May 4, 1959) Teddy Bergquist, Respondent, v. Erie Railroad Company, Defendant and Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellant. William Spencer & Son Corp., Third-Party Defendant-Respondent.

Motion by third-party plaintiff-appellant for leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals denied. Present — Nolan, P. J., Wenzel, Beldock, Ughetta and Hallinan, JJ.
